headline: Vow of Silence by 100 Senators Is Tough for a Talkative Bunch
abstract: Senators must give up their cellphones and speeches to sit silently at their desks for the duration of the impeachment trial.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON â€” In the Senate, few things are of more value to a lawmaker than the sound of his or her own voice.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
